transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, good afternoon sir.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Ah, is it from Rani Pipe Industries?
Executive: Haan boliye.
Executive: Ah, sir, main
Executive: mera naam Saransh hai, IndiaMART ke head office se baat kar raha tha, business manager. Kaise hain?
Executive: Actually, sir, ek visibility chal raha hai Rani Pipe Industries ka Biji Nagar se. To recently kuch din pehle na aapka ek aapka ek visibility chal raha hai sir IndiaMART ke sath. Biji Nagar se. aapka aawaz aawaz sunai nahi aa raha aapka. Sahi bolo kya. Abhi aawaz aa rahi hai sir meri?
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Ah, sir, main IndiaMART ke head office se baat kar raha tha. Actually aap logo ka ek call aaya tha mere paas customer support se. Aapne customer support pe call kiya tha, kuch issue aap face kar rahe the response ke sath, right? To mujhe thoda sa batayenge sir kya issue aa raha hai sir jo main sort out kar saku sir.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Kuch issue aap face kar rahe the na sir use use karte hue. Notification related.
Customer: Haan notification wo baad mein aa rahe the hamare ko.
Executive: To abhi aapne check kiya sir wo abhi aane shuru hue sir proper abhi aapne kuch consumption kiye buy leads kya hai?
Customer: Nahi check nahi kare. Aapka naam kya hai?
Executive: Mera naam Saransh hai sir. Saransh Agrawal.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Aap IndiaMART se baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Ji ji IndiaMART ke head office se baat kar raha tha business manager. Mai idhar se baat kar raha tha sir.
Customer: Fir aapka fraud hai bol ke aa raha hai aapka number spam bol ke aa raha hai. Aisa kaise aa raha hai sir?
Executive: Wo IndiaMART ka DID DID number hai DID number pe might bhi ho sakta hai ki wo Truecaller pe kisi ne update kar diya isliye fraud karke likha hua aa raha hai sir usme.
Customer: To main aapko aapko mera baat aap kaise share karu ye fraud hone ke baad?
Executive: Main aapko dusre number
Executive: Theek hai theek hai main update karta hu main aapko dusre number se fir main aapko connect karta hu. Theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's number is showing as fraud/spam.

- Notifications were coming late.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the reason for fraud tag.

- Executive offered to call from another number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call from another number.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- fraud, notification, buyleads, truecaller
